Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to police activity. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#126 Jackson

#7 Harrison

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
